name: Witching Hour V2
description:
This is an update to my Halloween Game Jam to incorporate changes/fixes based on playtest feedback.

See the original submittal here: https://franklinopolus.itch.io/witchinghour

Change Log Below:

  • Updating character hitboxes to make them easier to select
  • Added health regeneration to characters
  • Characters can use mana pool and wood pile at the same time
  • Fixed character pathing issue
  • Added wood resource indicator to minions
  • Added feedback messages when denied an action
  • Added an optional tutorial at beginning of the game.
  • minions can melee attack when not enhanced by spellbook
  • Witch/minions will now shoot a zombie repeatedly until it is dead after one click
